title: Instagram head Adam Mosseri says he's worried about Facebook in the 2020 election
text: Mosseri said he's nervous about Facebook's ability to navigate the 2020 U.S. presidential election after what he saw four years earlier.

title: WhatsApp sues Israel's NSO for allegedly helping spies hack phones around the world
text: WhatsApp sued Israeli surveillance firm NSO Group on Tuesday, accusing it of helping government spies break into the phones of roughly 1,400 users across four continents in a hacking spree whose targets included diplomats, political dissidents, journalists and senior government officials.

title: WhatsApp sues Israeli firm, accusing it of hacking activists' phones
text: NSO Group’s spyware allegedly used in cyber-attacks on lawyers and journalists

title: Facebook (FB) Earnings After Bell Wednesday: Can Lofty Expectations Be Met?
text: 2.1 billion people around the world use one of Facebook's family of services daily, while 2.7 billion utilize one of these at least once a month, whether it be Instagram, WhatsApp, Messenger, or Facebook.

title: Sen. Warner: Facebook's ad policy allows politicians to 'lie with impunity'
text: CNBC's "Closing Bell" team is joined by Senator Mark Warner (D-Va.) to discuss his letter to Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg, asking the CEO to reconsider the social media giant's political ad policies.

title: Facebook sues surveillance company NSO Group over alleged WhatsApp hack
text: The lawsuit claims that the Israeli surveillance company attempted to hack about 1,400 people using WhatsApp.

title: WhatsApp blames — and sues — mobile spyware maker NSO Group over its zero-day calling exploit
text: WhatsApp has filed a suit in federal court accusing NSO Group, an Israeli mobile surveillance maker, of creating an exploit that allowed the spyware’s operator to hack into a target’s phone and remotely spy on them. The lawsuit, filed in a California federal court, said the mobile surveillance outfit “developed their malware in order to […]

title: WhatsApp Says Israeli Firm Used Its App in Spy Program
text: In a federal lawsuit, the messaging service said it discovered the firm had targeted 1,400 WhatsApp accounts, including 100 journalists and human-rights activists.

title: Facebook sues Israeli cybersecurity company NSO and claims it helped hack WhatsApp
text: Facebook is suing an Israeli cybersecurity company over claims it hacked WhatsApp users earlier this year.

title: Facebook sues Israel's NSO Group over alleged WhatsApp hack
text: Facebook Inc  on Tuesday sued Israeli cyber surveillance firm NSO Group, alleging it hacked users of messaging platform WhatsApp earlier this year.

title: Here's What To Expect When Facebook Reports Quarterly Earnings
text: Facebook is set to report third-quarter earnings at a time the social networking giant is in the crosshairs of antitrust regulators. Facebook stock is down about 9.5% since its last report.

title: Should You Buy Facebook Ahead of Q3 Earnings?
text: Social media giant Facebook is set to release third-quarter fiscal 2019 results on Oct 30 after market close.

title: 5 Must See Big Tech Earnings Charts
text: How is Big Tech holding up in the great rotation?

title: Sen. Warner asks Mark Zuckerberg to reconsider Facebook's policy that allows false political ads
text: Sen. Mark Warner sent a letter to Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg late yesterday that called for the executive to reconsider his company's controversial policy that allows politicians and elected officials to run false advertisements on the platform.

title: International User Growth to Aid Facebook's (FB) Q3 Earnings
text: Facebook's (FB) third-quarter 2019 earnings are likely to have benefited from ad transparency initiatives amid increasing privacy concerns.

title: Sen. Warner pens letter to Zuckerberg over Facebook's political ads policy
text: Heat over the social network's decision to not fact-check ads from politicians continues to rise.

title: EU tells Facebook, Google and Twitter to take more action on fake news
text: The EU acknowledged tech companies have taken steps to be more transparent but said "there is more work to be done."

title: New Year, Not Q3, Is What Matters to Facebook Stock
text: FB stock comes down to a return to growth in 2020. It's forward commentary, not backward-looking earnings, that will move the stock after earnings.

title: Opinion: Facebook just dealt another potentially lethal blow to local journalism
text: Fresh from his grilling by the House Financial Services Committee, Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg arrived at the Paley Center for Media in New York Friday to announce Facebook News, which will curate "high quality" news and information using a combination of both humans and algorithms.

title: Facebook, Google, Twitter urged to do more to combat fake news in EU
text: Facebook , Google  and Twitter  must do more to tackle fake news or face regulatory action, the European Commission said on Tuesday.

title: Facebook is failing to prevent another human rights tragedy playing out on its platform, report warns
text: A report by campaign group Avaaz examining how Facebook’s platform is being used to spread hate speech in the Assam region of North East India suggests the company is once again failing to prevent its platform from being turned into a weapon to fuel ethnic violence. Assam has a long-standing Muslim minority population but ethnic […]
